TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Hey, can I get in on that?

Waiter, my soup is stuck in a time loop.

It'll never runs out ! Enjoy your unlimited soup !

Costs unlimited too btw.

 

 

Waiter ! I want me a takeout soup.

Edited April 10, 2018 by YNM

Okay, your soup will take you out to dinner, and then a moonlit stroll along the beach.

Waiter, my soup... it burns! It hurts so much. Please, take this soup away from me.

Uh... waiter? That's a turtle in my soup.

Edited April 11, 2018 by bananasrawesome

Consider it extra protein.

Waiter! There's a @Felbourn in my sou-MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS. MORE LIGHTS.

Ok, say stop when you want me to stop with the lightbulb grater.

Waiter, there's wind in my soup.

That's because we were cooling it in a window.

Waiter! A "chestnut soup" doesn't mean that a customer should swallow a nut into his chest.

That's nuts... whole nuts are better than processed things.

Hey waiter! I didn't say airplane soup, I said "plain soup".

I know you said plane soup, now are you going to eat it? The  turbines are quite good.

Waiter, my soup is on fire, in both meaning of the term.

Yes, we are both heating your soup and extinguishing our fire at once. Don't panic: this won't cost for you additional money.

Soup! Where is waiter?

I'm sorry, sir, but your waiter is still being cooked. It will be out shortly.

 

Waiter! There's a unresponsive Task Manager in my code soup!

Edited April 18, 2018 by TopHeavy11

Try turning it off and on again.

Waiter, Tantares updated with cool parts and I can't have them!

Try HotRockets to warm the cool parts and take them.

Waiter! When did you wash your hands the last time?

It was in the future by 20 years.

Waiter, there's an antimatter fly in my soup!

Kaboom

Waiter, my soup is just soap water.

So you can wash your hands right in the plate, and make your hands cleaner, and your soup denser.

Weighter! Why is the photonic drink so light?

Who knows?

Waitress! My soup doesn't know where it is!

Don't worry, your soup has a chaperone.

Waiter, my soup is pure evil.

Add some mud, it will be a dirty evil.

 

20 hours ago, roboslacker said:

your soup has a chaperone.

Chaper-1, unhave yourself from the soup.
Um... Waiter, there's a chaperone in my soup?

It's helping itself.

Yo waiter! I don't think the daily special tastes like it should. It tastes like it came from the chemist's lab...

Stop complaining and drink your sulfuric acid.

Waiter, there's a <div></span> in my soup

That's how HTML soup is dynamically created.

Waiter! Where is your <spoon /> tag?

It's in the hole (BWAAAA).

Waiter! There's a GTX 1090 in my soup!

You wanted PCB soup, right ?

 

Waiter ! I ordered for you a soup ! Come, sit with me !
